summary: Completed comprehensive testing of BLVX rebuild with new features. Backend APIs 100% functional (22/22 tests passed), frontend landing page and auth flow working perfectly. All new features successfully tested: The Vouch (Plates), The GC (Group Chat), The Stoop (Audio Rooms), visibility toggle (Block vs Cookout), and enhanced Bonita AI with multiple modes.
passed_tests: User authentication via Emergent OAuth + JWT sessions
Post creation with visibility toggle (Block/Cookout) - returns correct 201 status
The Vouch system - create and retrieve invite plates
The GC system - create group chats, get user GCs, send messages
The Stoop system - create audio rooms, get live stoops, join stoops
Feed endpoints (personal following feed and public explore feed)
User profile management and search functionality
Bonita AI integration - all 3 modes (conversation, vibe_check, tone_rewrite)
Landing page BLVX branding with logo and ENTER button
Google OAuth login flow via Emergent auth service
Culture pillars display (The Block, The Cookout, The Stoop)
A24 minimalist aesthetic with black background
Footer with Bonita Online status indicator

success_percentage.frontend: 100% (landing page and auth flow fully functional)
